biotools.summary: Pathogenicity prediction of human missense variants based on protein sequence, structure and dynamics | computationally predicting effects of saturation mutagenesis | In silico saturation mutagenesis | perform a complete scan of all possible 19 amino acid substitutions at each site on a human sequence. See example: H-Ras
